name: Legend of Qwerty
description: Legend of Qwerty is a typing game for novices and masters alike. The game borrows from the style of classic RPGs, but on the battlefield your typing skill determines your success. Level up and gain new spells and items to take on the game's toughest challenges in the campaign, test your luck in a randomized arena, or create and share your own levels with custom enemies, modifiers, and words.
